item.title: Compression Comparison
item.description: Compression Comparison Here I am going to show differences in various compression algorithms. This is a handy cheatsheet for (de)compressing commands. Compressing Gunzip tar -cjvf test.tar.gz test c - create archive j - gz v - verbose f - file name of output Bzip2 tar -czvf test.tar.bz2 test z - bz2 XZ tar -cJvf test.tar.xz test J - xz Zip zip -r test.zip test r - recursive 7zip 7z a test.
